patthana22.23:1.1_0: Nahīnaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.23:2.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.23:3.1_0: Namicchattaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sammattaniyato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.23:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.23:5.1_0: Namaggārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.23:6.1_0: Hetuyā chabbīsa …pe… āsevane pannarasa …pe… avigate chabbīsa.
patthana22.23:7.1_0: Naanuppanno nanahetu dhammo uppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.23:7.1_1: Nauppādī nanahetu dhammo uppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.23:7.1_2: Naanuppanno nanahetu ca nauppādī nanahetu ca dhammā uppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.23:8.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā tīṇi,
patthana22.23:8.1_1: sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye cha,
patthana22.23:8.1_2: pacchājāte vipāke indriye magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
